Quotes.Title: Introduction to Electrodynamics
Quotes.Author: David J. Griffiths
Quotes.Description: This well-known undergraduate electrodynamics textbook is now available in a more affordable printing from Cambridge University Press

Quotes.Title: The Silmarillion
Quotes.Author: Christopher Tolkien
Quotes.Description: The Silmarillion is a collection of mythopoeic works by English writer J. R. R. Tolkien

Quotes.Title: The Parrots Theorem
Quotes.Author: Christopher Tolkien
Quotes.Description: The Parrots Theorem is a French novel written by Denis Guedj and published in 1998

Quotes.Title: An Introduction to Quantum Physics
Quotes.Author: Stefanos Trachanas
Quotes.Description: This modern textbook offers an introduction to Quantum Mechanics as a theory that underlies the world around us, from atoms and molecules to materials, lasers, and other applications
